# First Chapter
```{r}
d = data.frame(
  category=c('a','b','c','d'),
  value=sample(1:10,4)
)

ggplotly(
  ggplot(d,aes(
      x=category,
      y=value,
      fill=category))+
    geom_bar(stat="identity")+
    pastelColors(d$category)
)
```
